title: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the DRP shall have to be rehabilitated according to the provisions in this Regulation
clause_text: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the DRP shall have to be rehabilitated according to the provisions in this Regulation. It may be in the same sector or other sectors within the jurisdiction of DRP.
